title: Syedaal extends well wishes for speedy recovery of Shibli Faraz
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 09 (APP):Deputy Chairman Senate Syedaal Khan on Wednesday expressed heartfelt wishes for the speedy recovery of Senate opposition leader Senator Syed Shibli Faraz, who is currently undergoing treatment at a hospital in Peshawar due to a cardiac ailment.
In a statement, the Deputy Chairman extended his sympathy to Senator Faraz, describing him as an active, well-informed, and serious-minded parliamentarian whose contributions to the Upper House are highly commendable.
He also offered prayers for Senator Farazâ€™s early and complete recovery and conveyed best wishes to his family during this difficult time.
